comments.comment:
Country does'nt need a leader like Hitler. Intelligent,educated and a leader with leadership quality should be there. He should love the country and its people and their well beign not of his family as it has been there till date. Just because Gotabhaya act as stern person doesnt mean That he can be a good leader. This is the stupidness of people. Very short sighted. Most important thing is the rule of law should be amended in all areas are concers. Muderes and drug dealers simply get bailout within a day and back to their business. This has to be change. Politicians should not he treated as extra ordinery people. They should be equal to any other public servent. Current situation, half of the public servant are getting salary for nothing. No productivity at all. Progress of a country depend on dicipline and productivity of people not just hecause of ruthless leader. Japanese are highly progressive people. There is no ruthless leader. Its because everyone love the country,well diciplined honest and maintain the intergrity. Rule of law apply to everyone.  

If people wants Gotabhaya to become a leader, then look at who is behind him. Bunch of rouges. Everyone has a corruprion case whether they may be proved or not in the court is a different thing. But they all know that non of them are honest. They all are corrupted. What a single leader can do when he is sorrounded by thieves.
